front.title: HMTFTP: HMAC-Derived TFTP with Optional AEAD Protection (v0.3)

abstract.t: HMTFTP is a lightweight UDP file transfer protocol derived from TFTP that adds a compact TLV mechanism and an optional AEAD protection mode for DATA payloads. Version v0.3 clarifies interoperability and extension governance rules so that independent implementations can evolve safely over time. The default UDP port is TBD1 and implementations MUST allow it to be configured.
